summary: The module provides utilities for handling text-to-text data in speech processing, including collate functions for batching, token conversion for ASR/TTS, and both map-style and iterable datasets that read manifests and provide tokenized sequences for model training.
business_intent: Facilitate the loading, tokenization, and batching of text (and optionally audio) data for hybrid ASR/TTS models, simplifying the data pipeline for model development and deployment.
